==Trivia==
*The Chinese name for this talent is {{Lang|''Ancient Yunlai Swordsmanship''|zh=云来古剑法|zh_rm=Yúnlái Gǔ Jiànfǎ}}, which is a reference to [[Keqing]]'s Normal Attack, {{Lang|[[Yunlai Swordsmanship]]|zh=云来剑法|zh_rm=Yúnlái Jiànfǎ}}.
**This parallel was kept in the Japanese, Korean, French, German, and Vietnamese localizations.
